title: Chola Inv Finance stock price up 0.32 per cent as Sensex slides - Economic Times
content: Chola Inv Finance stock price up 0.32 per cent as Sensex slides  Economic Times
description: As of 31-Dec-2021, promoters held 51.55 per cent stake in the company, while FIIs held 17.65 per cent and domestic institutional investors had 18.31 per cent.
